授業目的: 本授業では、受講生が語彙力を高め、自己の考えや意見を表わすための表現を修得し、様々な日常的および社会的問題に関して会話・ディカッションをし、比較的長いエッセイを書くことができる技能を身に着けることを目的とする。
到達目標:
本授業では、学生が日常的および社会的問題に関する与えられたトピックで会話・ディスカッションをし、比較的長い文章（３，４パラグラフ
を書くことができることを目指す。
学期末には、リサーチレポートが書けるようになっていることを目指す。
授業方法:
Distributions of class materials, instructions and assignments: will be through LUNA "Class Material/Assignment." The class materials, instructions and assignments for each session will be posted and become available on demand through LUNA "Class Material/Assignment" by the actual class time each week.
There will be a Zoom meeting several times during the term.　The details will be given after the class starts.
Check email and LUNA 「お知らせ」before the each session; there may be important messages about the class.

毎回の授業資料、課題は実際の授業日時までにLUNAの「教材・課題」欄に配信します。
学期中数回Zoom Meeting を実施する予定です。詳細は授業開始後通知します。
授業に関する重要な通知事項があるかもしれませんから、各週授業前に必ずメールやLUNAの「お知らせ」を確認してください。

トピック.授業計画1:
Although class will be conducted basically following the textbook, some supplementary materials will be also used.
Students will read, listen, discuss, and write on the issues given in the textbook and supplementary materials. There will be quizzes at certain intervals to review what students learned in class and to enrich their vocabulary.
Although students cannot practice speaking in pair work or group work in class this term, they are expected to practice speaking on their own following the instructions given in the class materials.
There will be a Zoom meeting once or twice during the term; students will be having a discussion in groups or pairs on the topics dealt with in the textbook.
Details will be given in the beginning of the term.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students are required to read the textbook, check vocabulary, and do some research to prepare for the class.  Writing assignments related to class activities will be given several times during the term.
